configuration.invalidStructure: Configuration file has invalid structure or missing required data

configuration.alreadyExists: Configuration already exists. Do you want to overwrite it?
configuration.loadSchemaFailed: Could not load settings schema for validation

git.noStagedFiles: No staged files found. Stage some changes before running.

api.generationFailed: Failed to generate messages from provider

network.invalidKey: The key appears to be invalid. Please check your key and try again.
network.checkConnection: Network error. Please check your internet connection and try again.

system.i18nNotInitialized: i18n not initialized when calling t("{{key}}")

messages.confirmReset: Are you sure you want to reset all settings to defaults?

messages.setupComplete: Setup complete! You can now run 'cmai' to generate commit messages

messages.manualCopyMessage: You can manually copy the message above
messages.terminalCommitReady: Edit command or press enter to execute
messages.editOrExecuteCommand: Edit the command below or press Enter to execute
messages.invalidKeyOrConnection: Invalid key or unable to connect to the API

prompts.tryAgain: Would you like to try again?

prompts.addCustomRules: Add custom rules for commit message generation?
prompts.whatToDo: What would you like to do?

labels.commitChoicesCount: Number of commit message options to generate
labels.redactSensitiveData: Redact sensitive data before sending to AI

generate.description: Generate commit messages for staged changes

interactive.name: Create commit
interactive.description: Generate message and create commit interactively
interactive.instruction: You can now use "git commit" without a message to generate one automatically

automatic.name: Copy to clipboard
automatic.description: Generate and copy message to clipboard
automatic.instruction: Run "cmai" or "cmai generate" to generate commit messages

terminal.name: Terminal output
terminal.description: Output commit command to terminal for editing
terminal.instruction: Run "cmai" or "cmai generate" to output commit command

validation.maxCommitLengthRange: Max commit length must be between {{min}} and {{max}}
validation.commitChoicesRange: Commit choices count must be between {{min}} and {{max}}

hints.optional: Optional: personalize how the AI generates commits

provider.resetNotice: Key and model have been reset for the new provider

maxLength.updated: Max commit length updated to: {{value}} characters

commitChoicesCount.title: Number of commit message options to generate

redactSensitive.title: Redact sensitive data before sending to AI

clipboard.allCommandsFailed: All clipboard commands failed. Tried {{count}} different methods.
clipboard.failedToCopy: Failed to copy to clipboard. Please ensure you have clipboard access.
clipboard.failedUnix: {{baseMessage}} On Unix systems, you may need to install xclip, xsel, or wl-clipboard.
clipboard.failedWindows: {{baseMessage}} Ensure PowerShell is available and clipboard access is permitted.
clipboard.failedMac: {{baseMessage}} Ensure pbcopy is available and clipboard access is permitted.

prompt.generate: Generate exactly {{commitChoicesCount}} commit messages for the following changes.

rules.noCapitalization: No capitalization at the start of the description.

types.build: build: build system or external dependencies

rules.title: Rules:
rules.eachMessageSeparateLine: Each message must be on a separate line
rules.optionsShouldDescribeAllChanges: The {{commitChoicesCount}} options should be different ways of describing the same complete set of changes
rules.eachCommitDescribesAll: Each commit message must describe ALL the changes in the difference, not just individual parts
rules.variationsInWording: The variations should be in wording/style, NOT in which changes are included
rules.followCommitStyle: Follow the commit style and format shown in the recent commits
rules.combineMultipleChanges: If multiple distinct changes exist, combine them appropriately (e.g., "update X and improve Y")
rules.useConventionalFormat: If no recent commits provided, use conventional commit format (type: description)

prompt.recentCommitsPrefix: Recent commit messages for styling, tone and formatting reference:
prompt.rejectedNote: NOTE: The user rejected the previous batch of suggestions. Please provide more diverse or creative alternatives.
prompt.rejectedMultipleNote: NOTE: The user has rejected {{regenerationAttempts}} previous batches of suggestions. Please provide significantly different alternatives with varied approaches, styles, and focus areas.
prompt.customRulesPrefix: Custom commit message rules (must be followed strictly):

temperatureAndTone.title: Temperature and Tone:
temperatureAndTone.matchFormality: Match the formality level of recent commits (professional vs casual)
temperatureAndTone.maintainTechnicalDepth: Maintain consistent technical depth and detail as shown in examples
temperatureAndTone.preserveNamingConventions: Preserve team's naming conventions and terminology
temperatureAndTone.mirrorSpecificity: Mirror the specificity and brevity patterns from previous commits

response.returnAsJson: Return your response as a JSON object with this exact structure:
response.generateExactly: Generate exactly {{commitChoicesCount}} commit messages in the JSON array.
response.important: IMPORTANT: Return ONLY valid JSON - no explanations, no markdown formatting, no code blocks.

ai.responseNotObject: Response is not a valid object
ai.jsonParsingFailed:
JSON parsing failed, falling back to text parsing:
{{error}}
